question: Vijayaditya II was succeeded by which of the following kings?
explanation: Vljayaditya III was the successor of Vijayaditya II. He ruled from AD. 844 to 888. He also defeated Krishna II, the Rashtrakuta king, and destroyed his capital Manyakheta or Malkhed. He also defeated the Gangas. Amoghavarsha, the Rashtrakuta king,
